Row.Text: Breathtaking tiles receive +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith form each type of adjacent Mountains, Lakes, and Coast terrain; +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith if the tile has unimproved Forest.[NEWLINE]Pastures and Plantations triggers Culture Bombs, and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture per turn.
Mondstadt unique recon unit that replaces the Skirmisher. Available from the start of the game. Can scale cliff walls, +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement when staring turns on Hills.

Replaces the Government Plaza and cheaper to build. Provides regional Defence equal to an Encampment.[NEWLINE]Cities on the same continent with your original [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities whenever you are not at war with any civilization.

Gneshin Impact unique building that replaces the Monument. Provides an additional +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE]Units instantly heals when moving to a Statue of the Seven. The total Healing per turn is 50 (shared among all units).

Unlocks the Builder ability to constrcut a Adventurers' Guild, unique to Genshin Impact.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Production] Production; +1 [ICON_Gold] to adjacent tiles. +25% combat experience for all land units trained in this city. One per city. Tiles with Adventurers' Guild cannot be swapped.
